patterns: Am I eligible for your services?
What are the criteria for your services?
responses: To be eligible for our services, you must be a resident of Indonesia who already have an Identity Card, live in Jabodetabek, Bandung, Surabaya, or Bali areas, and have a steady income source with a minimum income of IDR 5 million per month. Additionally, you should have at least IDR 20 million in loan. If you meet these criteria, we can assist you in managing your debt effectively. For more information, you can visit this website: https://flin.co.id/program-dana-talangan/syarat-kelayakan/

What documents are needed for your services?
What do I need to submit?
responses:
To apply for our services, you will need to provide the following documents: 
1. KTP (Identity Card) 
2. Selfie 
3. Bank statement for the last 6 months 
4. Annual tax document, and 
5. Pay slip from the last 3 months. If you have any questions about the required documents, feel free to ask!
You can visit our website at https://flin.co.id/program-dana-talangan/prosedur-pengajuan/ to learn more about the process.
